synopsis.text: War veteran Mr. Ogino, believed to have perished during World War II, is resurrected in the futuristic year of 2032 through scientific advancements. As he navigates a world led by one of his descendants, he embarks on an unexpected journey to Mars. However, the spaceship experiences malfunctions due to the presence of a spiritual entity from the past, causing it to veer off course towards the mythical Buddha's paradise. This captivating tale is brought to life by director Shigeji Ogino, who not only casts himself as the protagonist but also incorporates real-life footage of himself into the film.
